dimension: 33 x 12 in. (83.82 x 30.48 cm) (width of tassels side-by-side)
title: Head piece
description: black band with strip of some black and mostly shaded blue beads and brass coin-like discs; handing from band is padded section of black silk-like fabric with coins; finished with two layers of four black tassels wrapped in metallic threads of ball and chain designs; lined in print cotton
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
